Name: The Cheshire Cat
Ingredients: 15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of ice block).
Review: A twist of the classic Vieux Carr√© with scotch substituting rye whiskey and cherry wine in place of vermouth. The bitter balance is provided by aromatised wine.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Georgia Billing at The Looking Glass Cocktail Club in London, England. Georgia's original and authentic recipe calls for Gravino Cherry wine (not cherry brandy), Reina Lab Spiced Rosemary syrup (rather than cinnamon sugar syrup) and the addition of her own Reina Lab Sinner Bitters.
Garnish: Lemon zest twist, rosemary sprig & smouldering cinnamon stick
